affordableSection.title: An Affordable Reservation System With No Strings Attached
affordableSection.description: Most reservation systems cost more than they're worth. Oddle Reserve is differentâ€”no subscription fees, no hidden charges, just simple pay-as-you-go pricing.

items.title: Traditional Restaurants Going Digital
items.description: Facing digitalization challenges as the next generation takes over, but hesitant about costly subscriptions? Oddle Reserve's pay-per-use model smoothens the transition, eliminating hefty monthly fees.
items.imageAlt: Dim sum dishes on a table representing traditional restaurants

items.title: Restaurants with High Walk-In Traffic
items.description: High walk-in traffic with limited online bookings, managing large group reservations can be challenging. Oddle Reserve's pay-per-use model lets you pay only when you need it, making it an ideal solution for occasional yet crucial online reservations.
items.imageAlt: Exterior of a soup restaurant representing high walk-in restaurants

items.title: Restaurants Relying on High-Commission Marketplaces
items.description: Paying hefty per-pax fees to marketplaces that intercept direct bookings through ads can be frustrating. Oddle Reserve eliminates commission and charges only per reservationâ€”not per paxâ€”putting you back in control of your bookings.
